welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hopewell, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy exploring our quaint streets and experiencing all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dinwiddie County Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dinwiddie County Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods via air.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Richmond International Airport houses the check-in counters, security checkpoints, and most of the airport's amenities.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is home to gates A1-A12, and primarily serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is home to gates B1-B14, and primarily serves domestic flights operated by United Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is home to gates C1-C18, and primarily serves domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue, Allegiant, and other airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the 'RIC Free WiFi' network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.
